tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    chatting_speed VARCHAR(50),
    language_preference VARCHAR(50),
    timezone VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  theme VARCHAR(255),
  language VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ChatbotResponses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_text TEXT,
  emotion VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    notification_settings BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ChatbotRecommendations (
    recommendation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE ChatbotResponses (
    response_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    preference_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    response_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES chatbot_messages(message_id)
);

CREATE TABLE chatbot_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    recommendation TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES chatbot_messages(message_id)
);
